channel.title: Home on Those Optimize Guys
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Those Optimize Guys

item.title: About
item.description:
Who am I?

By day, I am a software engineer. My current skillset includes:

  • Software architecture specification
  • Developing web applications using the Phoenix Framework
  • Modeling Graph Data using Neo4j Graph Database
  • Managing large software projects

By night, I am interested in:

  • Amateur radio (Callsign KB8QPT) including Packet Radio, Traffic Handling, QRP, and Morse Code (CW)
  • Process automation and optimization
  • Photography
  • The Gemini Protocol

I am using this site as a place to solidify the ideas that I implement in the hopes to gain clarity on them, and hopefully, help someone else along their journey.

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description:
For a quick cheatsheet, check out https://simplemde.com/markdown-guide.

This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.
